meanings.definition: Peacefullest: superlative form of peaceful, meaning most peaceful or calm.
meanings.sent1: The meadow at sunset was the peacefullest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The lake was the peacefullest spot in the entire forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked peacefullest when napping in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the peacefullest melody in the noisy city.
meanings.sent5: The old oak tree provided the peacefullest shade on hot days.
